name: Anonymous
comment:
So. On that note we can assume that nameless can keep their character progress when they die and respawn since those nameless are in no state to handle a pegasus otherwise.

This arguably makes them more of a threat: they can take bigger risks than IDers since they're not back to scratch if the gamble doesn't pay off. Presumably part of the reason they were so eager to try a revolt of sorts.

I'd assume this is also how DH hasn't fallen apart already
